# Mio Road Assets Pack [Unstable] Add many road assets, including roads with service lanes.
---
### This is an unstable beta version, please don't subscribe unless you know what you're doing! ### 这是不稳定测试版本，除非你知道你在做什么请不要订阅
--- ### Warning: Road assets are **highly experimental**. Please back up your save file before use. Known issues include: - Once your save uses these roads, **removing the mod** may cause white textures, crashes, or game exits. - Subscribing to assets **without the complete loading of assets** (not restarted twice) may lead to errors and missing models. - If your **mods fail to load successfully** while subscribing to assets, it may result in errors/missing models. - Sometimes, there's a slight chance of the CID file missing during asset download/update. You'll need to **delete and reinstall** this mod.
